title: Home
meta_title: Ascent Group Construction — Residential Painting & Stucco in Mississauga
meta_description: Ascent Group Construction delivers expert residential painting and Stucco/EIFS services across the GTA. Request a free estimate or view our portfolio.
body_html:
Build with Confidence.

Mississauga specialists in residential painting & Stucco / EIFS — serving the Greater Toronto Area.

At Ascent Group Construction we combine craftsmanship, technology, and respect for the communities we build in. Based in Mississauga and serving the GTA, we specialize in residential painting and Stucco/EIFS. Every project — big or small — receives an owner-level commitment to safety, schedule and finish quality.

Why Choose Ascent

  • Quality-first crews
  • Transparent pricing
  • Guaranteed workmanship
  • Local community focus

Our Services

Residential Painting · Stucco / EIFS · Project Management · Site Consultations.

How It Works

  1. Book a free estimate
  2. Site assessment & fixed proposal
  3. Book & build — we deliver

Trusted & Certified: Licences, insurance, WSIB, warranty details.

Footer blurb: Ascent Group Construction — Serving homeowners across the GTA with trusted, professional painting and Stucco services. Licensed, insured, and locally proud.

title: About
meta_title: About Ascent Group Construction — Our Story & Values
meta_description: Learn about Ascent Group Construction — our mission, safety-first policies, and the team delivering premium painting and Stucco services across the GTA.
body_html:
About Ascent Group Construction

Mission: Founded in Mississauga, Ascent Group Construction exists to improve homes and neighborhoods through high-quality finishes and reliable service. Our mission is to deliver exceptional results while prioritizing safety, communication, and environmental responsibility.

Our Story

  • 2017 — Founding: Ascent Group formed by construction professionals with a shared vision.
  • 2019 — Expanded Services: Introduced specialized Stucco/EIFS offerings.
  • 2022 — Tech & Systems: Implemented digital scheduling and quality control.
  • 2024 — Community Growth: Partnerships with local suppliers and trade schools.

Core Values

  • Quality Craftsmanship
  • Community Focus
  • Safety & Transparency
  • Innovation

Safety & Certifications

Fully licensed and insured. WSIB-compliant. All team members follow site-specific safety orientation and PPE standards.

Meet the Team →

title: Services
meta_title: Services — Residential Painting, Stucco & Construction — Ascent Group
meta_description: Ascent Group Construction provides residential painting, Stucco/EIFS, and project management services. Read detailed service descriptions and request a custom quote.
body_html:
Our Services

We focus on three pillars of residential exterior and interior finishing: Painting, Stucco/EIFS, and Project Management. Every service is delivered with a focus on durability, finish quality, and communication.

Residential Painting

Interior & exterior painting with professional prep, premium coatings, and color consultations. Get a painting estimate

Stucco / EIFS

Full EIFS systems, repairs, and performance-driven exterior cladding installations. Get a Stucco estimate

Project Management & Renovation

End-to-end coordination, permitting support, and trades management for larger remodels. Discuss your project

Maintenance & Touch-Ups

Seasonal maintenance, touch-ups, and warranty repairs. Book maintenance

title: Residential Painting
meta_title: Residential Painting Services — Interior & Exterior — Ascent Group
meta_description: Professional residential painting in the GTA. Interior and exterior painting, prep, color consultations, and premium finishes. Request a quote today.
body_html:
Residential Painting — Interior & Exterior

A great paint job starts with preparation. At Ascent Group Construction, our painting service emphasizes surface prep, high-quality coatings, and meticulous application to deliver durable, beautiful finishes for homes across the GTA.

What’s included

  • Detailed surface inspection & documented scope
  • Cleaning, light carpentry repairs, caulking, and sanding
  • Primer & two-coat application with premium paint brands (low-VOC options available)
  • Color consultation with digital color mockups upon request
  • Final walkthrough and touch-up list

Typical timeline

Small jobs (1–3 rooms): 2–5 days.
Full exterior painting: 5–12 business days (weather permitting).

Pricing guide: Estimates are provided per square foot. Use the estimator for an instant range — for detailed pricing we perform a site visit.

See our recent exterior transformation

title: Stucco / EIFS
meta_title: Stucco & EIFS Installation — Ascent Group Construction
meta_description: Expert Stucco and EIFS installation, repair, and restoration across the GTA. High-performance systems, insulation integration, and long-term warranties.
body_html:
Stucco & EIFS Systems

Ascent Group specializes in modern Stucco/EIFS systems that combine insulation and cladding for energy performance and visual appeal. Our crews install, repair, and finish systems to manufacturer standards, ensuring longevity and warranty compliance.

Services include

  • Full system installations (substrate prep, WRB, insulation, basecoat, finish)
  • Repairs and patching (crack remediation, flashing replacement)
  • Texture & finish options: fine aggregate, synthetic stucco, textured finishes
  • Moisture management and flashing integration

Use our estimator for an initial range

title: Projects
meta_title: Project Portfolio — Ascent Group Construction Projects
meta_description: Browse Ascent Group Construction’s portfolio of residential painting and Stucco projects across the GTA. Filter by service type and view case studies.
body_html:
Projects & Case Studies

Explore a curated selection of our recent work. Each project includes a gallery, scope details, challenges, and outcomes to showcase our approach to craftsmanship and project delivery.

Use filters to sort by Service (Painting, Stucco), Location, or Year. Click a project to view detailed case studies with before/after images and client testimonials.

title: Maple Ave Home
meta_title: Maple Ave Exterior Transformation — Ascent Group Construction
meta_description: Exterior painting and trim restoration at Maple Ave — full case study including process, timeline, and client testimonial.
body_html:
Maple Ave — Exterior Transformation

Location: Mississauga | Service: Exterior Painting & Trim Restoration | Duration: 8 days

Challenge

The 1960s bungalow required paint removal in select areas, rotted trim replacement, and color updating to improve curb appeal while matching neighborhood guidelines.

Solution

Comprehensive inspection and targeted carpentry repairs. Primer, two coats of premium acrylic latex, and color consultation to select a weather-proof palette. Protected site perimeter and daily cleanup.

Outcome

Curb appeal dramatically improved; client reported high satisfaction and noted “professional crew and minimal disruption.” Project delivered on schedule and within the proposed estimate.

title: Cedar Townhouse Complex
meta_title: Cedar Townhouse Stucco Repair — Ascent Group Construction
meta_description: Stucco repair and remediation at Cedar Townhouse Complex — learn about our moisture-control approach and finish restoration.
body_html:
Cedar Townhouse — Stucco Repair & Restoration

Location: Oakville | Service: Stucco Repair & Moisture Remediation | Duration: 3 weeks

Challenge

Signs of water ingress through failed flashing and hairline cracking across multiple units.

Solution

Used infrared inspection and moisture meters to identify substrate issues. Replaced failed flashings, repaired substrate, and reinstated EIFS base and finish with manufacturer-approved materials. Coordinated with condo board and residents for scheduling and access.

Outcome

Restored cladding performance and improved thermal envelope. Follow-up inspections confirmed remediation success.

title: Hillcrest Interior Refresh
meta_title: Hillcrest Interior Painting — Ascent Group Construction
meta_description: Interior refresh for Hillcrest residence — complete painting, trim, and specialty finishes. Read the full case study.
body_html:
Hillcrest — Interior Refresh

Location: Toronto | Service: Interior Painting | Duration: 6 days

Challenge

Homeowner wanted a fresh modern palette and minimal disruption during a family event.

Solution

Nightly staging and protective covers; sectional painting plan to limit disruption. Premium eggshell and satin finishes in high-traffic areas, accent walls with specialty finishes.

Outcome

Client praised the team’s care and ability to meet a tight timeline.

title: Lakeside Cottage Renovation
meta_title: Lakeside Cottage — Stucco & Exterior Painting — Ascent Group Construction
meta_description: Full exterior renovation of a lakeside cottage including Stucco repairs and complete exterior painting — read the case study.
body_html:
Lakeside Cottage — Full Exterior Renovation

Location: Mississauga area | Service: Stucco replacement & Exterior Painting | Duration: 4 weeks

Challenge

Exposure to lake spray had degraded finishes. Owners wanted a resilient finish and better insulation.

Solution

Partial removal and replacement of degraded EIFS sections, upgraded insulation layer, and final textured finish to client spec. Complete exterior painting of trim and soffits with marine-grade coatings.

Outcome

A durable, attractive exterior with improved thermal performance; clients received an extended warranty on the EIFS work.
